item.title: OpenAI 聘请前优步高管担任首席合规官
item.description: OpenAI 已聘请优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：OpenAI has hired former Uber Technologies Inc. executive Scott Schools to serve as its first chief compliance officer, bolstering the startup’s efforts to adapt to emerging global regulations around artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩称增长乏力可能加剧通货紧缩压力
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，日益严峻的欧元区经济可能会加剧消费价格增长的放缓。【原文：An increasingly dire euro-area economy might exacerbate slowing consumer-price growth, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 加州小型艺术学校面临信用降级的危险
item.description: 加利福尼亚州帕萨迪纳市一所成立于 1930 年的大学面临着信用评级被下调的危险。【原文：A college in Pasadena, California, founded in 1930, is in danger of having its credit rating downgraded.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦敦促灵活调整利率，避免落后于曲线
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行必须灵活地进一步下调利率，以避免行动过于缓慢的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank must be agile with further interest-rate cuts to avoid the risk of acting too slowly, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会指控四家公司淡化与 SolarWinds 有关的黑客事件
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会指控四家被黑公司淡化网络攻击的重要性，四家被黑公司将支付总计近 700 万美元的赔偿金，这是 SolarWinds 公司大规模泄密事件的最新后果。【原文：Four hacked companies will pay a total of almost $7 million to settle US Securities and Exchange Commission allegations that they downplayed the significance of the cyberattacks, the latest fallout from the massive SolarWinds Corp. breach.】

item.title: EQT 董事长称地缘政治风险是头号担忧，而非更高利率
item.description: EQT AB 董事长康尼-容松（Conni Jonsson）表示，与借贷成本上升的问题相比，当前世界地缘政治的紧张局势更令其企业担忧。【原文：EQT AB’s Chairman Conni Jonsson said the geopolitical tensions in the world right now are a much bigger concern for his business than the issue of higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 盖特莫尔推动手表回购，在美国上市
item.description: 盖特莫尔资本管理公司（Gatemore Capital Management）持有瑞士手表集团公司（Watches of Switzerland Group Plc）的股票，并要求这家奢侈钟表零售商积极回购股票，并考虑在美国上市。【原文：Gatemore Capital Management has taken a position in Watches of Switzerland Group Plc and is asking the retailer of luxury timepieces to pursue an aggressive share buyback and consider listing in the US.】

item.title: 应用营养公司伦敦首次公开募股的价格可能接近低点
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，蛋白质奶昔生产商应用营养公司（Applied Nutrition Plc）很可能将其在伦敦的首次公开募股定价定在市场定价范围的底部。【原文：Protein-shake maker Applied Nutrition Plc is likely to price its initial public offering in London toward the bottom of its marketed price range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特百惠在法官干预后达成协议避免清算
item.description: 特百惠品牌公司（Tupperware Brands Corp.）在负责破产案的联邦法官的推动下，为其债权人达成了一项收购协议，结束了这场有可能导致这家标志性公司破产清算的争议。【原文：Tupperware Brands Corp. hammered out a deal for its creditors to acquire the business, ending a dispute that’s risked a liquidation of the iconic company after a push from the federal judge overseeing the bankruptcy.】

item.title: 据说 Dye & Durham 在收到收购意向后正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大法律软件公司 Dye & Durham Ltd. 在收到收购意向后，正在探讨出售事宜。【原文：Dye & Durham Ltd., a Canadian legal software company, is exploring a sale after receiving takeover interest, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通称信贷市场对美国大选基本无动于衷
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Corporate bond markets don’t seem to be pricing in negative outcomes from the upcoming US election, even if a Republican sweep of the White House and both houses of Congress results in higher debt yields, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 纽柯因钢铁需求预警股价创六个月最大跌幅
item.description: 美国最大的钢铁生产商纽柯公司（Nucor Corp.【原文：Shares of Nucor Corp., the largest US steelmaker, dropped by the most in six months after the producer warned that demand for the alloy will remain soft headed into 2025, indicating a rebound may be further off than anticipated.】

item.title: 中国需求放缓加剧，欧莱雅销售受挫
item.description: 欧莱雅上一季度的销售额令人失望，因为这家美容公司受到了中国消费放缓加深的影响。【原文：L’Oreal posted disappointing sales last quarter as the beauty company suffers from a deepening consumer slowdown in China.】

item.title: 鲸鱼押注特朗普，Polymarket 打击美国用户
item.description: 基于加密货币的预测市场 Polymarket 正在进行新一轮检查，以核实其平台上的大额交易者是否来自美国以外的国家，因为美国人不允许在该网站上进行交易。【原文：Cryptocurrency-based predictions market Polymarket is conducting fresh checks to verify that big spenders on its platform are based outside of the US, since people in that country aren’t allowed to trade on the website that has seen a surge in bets favoring Donald Trump to win the presidential election.】

item.title: 巴西考虑在 2025 年初进口液化天然气，因为水力资源在减少
item.description: 由于持续干旱的天气对水力发电构成威胁，巴西的天然气买家正在询问是否有可能在第一季度购买全球运输的天然气。【原文：Gas buyers in Brazil are inquiring about potential purchases of global shipments well into the first quarter as persistently dry weather threatens hydropower generation.】

item.title: 华为技术公司的最新人工智能处理器由台积电制造
item.description: 对华为科技公司最新人工智能产品的调查发现，一款先进的处理器是由台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司制造的，这表明中国仍在努力可靠地制造足够数量的先进芯片。【原文：An investigation of Huawei Technologies Co.’s latest AI offering has unearthed an advanced processor made by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., suggesting that China is still struggling to reliably make advanced chips in sufficient quantities.】

item.title: 交易员认为美国经济软着陆，国债暴跌恍如1995年
item.description: 上一次美国政府债券因美联储开始降息而大幅抛售时，艾伦-格林斯潘正在策划一次罕见的软着陆。【原文：The last time US government bonds sold off this much as the Federal Reserve started cutting interest rates, Alan Greenspan was orchestrating a rare soft landing.】

item.title: 美国银行通过 11 年期交易加入银行债券销售狂潮
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）公布的盈利超出分析师预期，成为最新一家进入美国投资级债券市场的华尔街大银行。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is the latest big Wall Street bank to tap the US investment-grade bond market after reporting earnings that beat analysts’ estimates.】

item.title: 工会谈判结束后，Northvolt 工厂裁员超过 1200 人
item.description: 在 IF Metall 工会宣布该公司的主要生产基地将解雇 800 多名会员后，陷入困境的瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 目前的裁员人数已达到约 1200 人。【原文：The number of layoffs at troubled Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB is now at around 1,200 following an announcement from the IF Metall union that more than 800 of its members will be let go from the firm’s key manufacturing site.】

item.title: 生产锂既慢又脏。有解决办法吗？
item.description: 对绿色能源革命至关重要的一种物质--锂，正面临着未来供应紧张的风险。【原文：A substance seen as critical to the green energy revolution, lithium, is at risk of a future supply crunch.】

item.title: 菲律宾受暴风雨影响周三停工停课
item.description: 菲律宾表示，受热带风暴 "飓风特拉米 "影响，吕宋岛主要地区的政府办公室和学校将于周三暂停工作。【原文：The Philippines said work in government offices and classes in the main Luzon island will be suspended Wednesday due to tropical storm Trami.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称美国大选为脆弱市场带来 "高度不确定性
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，鉴于候选人在贸易优先事项上的巨大分歧，美国大选正在给市场和政策制定者带来 "高度不确定性"。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said the US election is creating “high uncertainty” for markets and policymakers, given the sharply divergent trade priorities of the candidates.】

item.title: 如果特朗普赢得美国大选，高盛认为欧元有下跌 10%的风险
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said the euro could drop as much as 10% versus the dollar if Donald Trump and the Republicans win next month’s US elections and enact high global tariffs and generous domestic tax cuts.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼认为欧洲央行不远的将来会进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，欧元区通胀率的回落速度超过预期，这将使欧洲央行在不久之后再次降息。【原文：A faster-than-expected retreat in euro-zone inflation will allow the European Central Bank to cut interest rates again before too long, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: Anthropic 的新型人工智能工具可分析您的屏幕并代表您采取行动
item.description:
新功能可解读用户在电脑上看到的内容，并为他们完成在线任务。【原文：

The new capability can interpret what a user is seeing on their computer and complete tasks online for them.

】

item.title: Gensler 认为价值 13 万亿美元的欧洲美元市场存在潜在危险
item.description: 华尔街的头号警察对欧洲美元市场煽动全球经济不稳定的潜力敲响了警钟，他再次对私人信贷中蕴含的风险发出了警告。【原文：Wall Street’s top cop is sounding an alarm about the Eurodollar market’s potential to foment instability in global economies, and he renewed warnings about risks embedded in private credit.】

item.title: 拉加德称特朗普应访问美联储以了解其工作有多难
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德对唐纳德-特朗普的两个主要不满提出质疑，为货币政策制定者和全球贸易辩护。【原文：Christine Lagarde challenged two of Donald Trump’s key gripes, defending monetary-policy makers and global trade.】

item.title: 拉加德认为欧洲央行利率方向明确，步伐有待决定
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行借贷成本的方向已经明确，但降低借贷成本的步伐仍有待决定。【原文：The direction of European Central Bank borrowing costs is clear but the pace at which they’ll be lowered is still to be decided, according to President Christine Lagarde, who didn’t rule out bigger moves.】

item.title: Arm 首席执行官哈斯称伦敦二次上市并非优先事项
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 首席执行官雷内-哈斯（Rene Haas）表示，在这家成立于英国的芯片设计公司选择在纽约进行首次公开募股一年多之后，在伦敦进行二次股票销售并非当务之急。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Rene Haas said a secondary share sale in London was not a priority more than a year after the UK-founded chip designer chose New York for its initial public offering.】

item.title: 乌克兰总检察长在泽连斯基抨击贪污腐败后辞职
item.description: 乌克兰总检察长安德烈-科斯汀（Andriy Kostin）在对检察官获取虚假残疾身份进行大规模调查后提交了辞呈，这招致了总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）的批评。【原文：Ukrainian Prosecutor General Andriy Kostin submitted his resignation following a large-scale investigation into prosecutors obtaining fake disability statuses, which drew criticism from President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.】
